name: Remember Ben
description:
A short platformer made in 72 hours for

GDL - Metal Monstrosity Jam about an old robot who tries to remember who he is in a world full of advanced robots.

I hope you will enjoy it!

Instructions:

-Move: WASD or arrow keys

-Jump: Space or K

Update 1:

-Lowered down the speed of the character and added a sprint button(L or left Ctrl)

-Made the level a little more forgiving

-The jam version is Winx86 and the updated version is Winx86V0.9.

PS: The game has no audio. I will add it after the jam, with the story and special effects. It is a little bit glitchy, because of a bug, but totally playable.
